fullyTrusted.title: Fully trusted
fullyTrusted.description: Emails delivered with both successful SPF and DKIM.

partiallyTrusted.title: Partially trusted
partiallyTrusted.description: Emails delivered with either successful SPF or DKIM.

untrusted.title: Untrusted
untrusted.description: Emails delivered where SPF and DKIM both failed.

quarantined.title: Quarantined
quarantined.description: Emails sent to spam folder because both SPF and DKIM failed.

rejected.title: Rejected
rejected.description: Emails not delivered to the user because both SPF and DKIM failed.
